what: Get data from a SDMX API — sdmx_get_data
title: Get data from a SDMX API — sdmx_get_data
text: Retrieve data sdmx api return data.frame

title: Get data from a SDMX API — sdmx_get_data
code: sdmx_get_data(   req,   format = c("csv", "json"),   labels = c("both", "id"),   ...,   as.data.table = FALSE )

title: Get data from a SDMX API — sdmx_get_data
text: req httr2 request object format format data. Either "csv" "json" labels labels include data. Either "" "id" ... reserved future use .data.table TRUE return data.table::data.table().

title: Get data from a SDMX API — sdmx_get_data
text: data.frame data.table depending value .data.table

title: Get data from a SDMX API — sdmx_get_data
code: if (interactive()){   dfs <- sdmx_get_dataflows_v2_1()   flowRef <- dfs$flowRefs[1]    d <-     sdmx_req_data_v2_1(flowRef = flowRef) |>     sdmx_get_data()    head(d)     # json   d <-     sdmx_req_data_v2_1(flowRef = flowRef) |>     sdmx_get_data(format = "json")  }

title: Get sdmx dataflows — sdmx_get_dataflows_v2_1
text: Get sdmx dataflows given endpoint

title: Get sdmx dataflows — sdmx_get_dataflows_v2_1
text: req character string given endpoint agencyID character string given agencyID

title: Get sdmx dataflows — sdmx_get_dataflows_v2_1
text: data.frame available dataflows

title: Request SDMX data — sdmx_req_data_v2_1
text: sdmx_req_data_v2_1 wrapper around smdx rest api v2.1 used retrieve data api.

title: Request SDMX data — sdmx_req_data_v2_1
code: sdmx_req_data_v2_1(   req = NULL,   resource = c("data", "metadata"),   flowRef = NULL,   key = NULL,   providerRef = NULL,   format = c("csv", "json", "xml"),   ...,   startPeriod = NULL,   endPeriod = NULL,   updatedAfter = NULL,   firstNObservations = NULL,   lastNObservations = NULL,   dimensionAtObservation = NULL,   detail = c("full", "dataonly", "serieskeysonly", "nodata"),   includeHistory = NULL,   labels = c("both", "id") )

title: Request SDMX data — sdmx_req_data_v2_1
text: req endpoint httr2 request object resource resource request. Either "data" "metadata" flowRef flow reference request, see details key key request, see details providerRef provider reference request, see details format format request. Either "csv", "json" "xml" ... Additional parameters pass request startPeriod start period data returned endPeriod end period data returned updatedAfter return data updated date firstNObservations return first n observations lastNObservations return last n observations dimensionAtObservation dimensions observations returned detail detail data return. Either "full", "dataonly", "serieskeysonly" "nodata" includeHistory Include different versions data labels Include labels data, valid format "csv"

title: Request SDMX data — sdmx_req_data_v2_1
text: modified httr2::request() object

title: Retrieve sdmx structure — sdmx_req_structure_v2_1
text: Wrapper SDMX REST v2.1 interface structured information

title: Retrieve sdmx structure — sdmx_req_structure_v2_1
code: sdmx_req_structure_v2_1(   req = NULL,   resource = "dataflow",   agencyID = NULL,   resourceID = NULL,   version = NULL,   itemID = NULL,   format = c("json", "xml"),   ...,   detail = c("full", "allstubs", "referencestubs", "allcompletestubs",     "referencecompletestubs", "referencepartial"),   references = c("none", "parents", "parentsandsiblings", "children", "descendants",     "all") )

title: Retrieve sdmx structure — sdmx_req_structure_v2_1
text: req endpoint httr2 request object resource resource request. One "datastructure", "metadatastructure", "categoryscheme", "conceptscheme", "codelist", "hierarchicalcodelist", "organisationscheme", "agencyscheme", "dataproviderscheme", "dataconsumerscheme", "organisationunitscheme", "dataflow", "metadataflow", "reportingtaxonomy", "provisionagreement", "structureset", "process", "categorisation", "contentconstraint", "attachmentconstraint", "actualconstraint", "allowedconstraint", "structure", "transformationscheme", "rulesetscheme", "userdefinedoperatorscheme", "customtypescheme", "namepersonalisationscheme", "vtlmappingscheme" agencyID agency ID request resourceID resource ID request version version request itemID item ID request format format request. Either "json" "xml" ... saved future use detail detail data return. Either "full", "allstubs", "referencestubs", "allcompletestubs", "referencecompletestubs", "referencepartial" references references return. Either "none", "parents", "parentsandsiblings", "children", "descendants", ""

title: Retrieve sdmx structure — sdmx_req_structure_v2_1
text: modified httr2::request() object
